content:
Release V 6.2 says... about MicroProfile settings and PIDs

While backward compatibility for installations using a single PID Provider account is provided, updating to use the new microprofile settings is highly recommended
and will be required in a future version.

That "future version" hasn't happened yet, right? Any idea which one?
We haven't decided yet. The legacy way is still supported.

Thanks, we are doing 3 upgrades at once this week and am trying to cut down on what we MUST do and could do.

Going from V6.2, to 6.3, to 6.4, to 6.5.
Sherry Lake has marked this topic as resolved.
